title: How to Make Basic Vegan Nut Roast

steps.headline: Fry the onions in a saucepan or frying pan on medium heat until translucent.
Add the grated carrot, tomatoes, breadcrumbs and vegetable stock (or juice).
Cook on a low heat for 15 - 20 minutes.
Turn off the heat once cooked, add the nuts and mix together.
Line a loaf tin with baking paper or grease with olive oil.
Scoop the cooked mixture into the loaf tin and pat down evenly with the back of a fork or wooden spoon.
Bake in the oven for 25 - 30 minutes.

text: Assemble the ingredients.  Fry the onions in a saucepan or frying pan on medium heat until translucent.  Add the grated carrot, tomatoes, breadcrumbs and vegetable stock (or juice).  Cook on a low heat for 15 - 20 minutes.  Turn off the heat once cooked, add the nuts and mix together.  Turn on the oven at 200 °C (392 °F).  Line a loaf tin with baking paper or grease with olive oil.  Scoop the cooked mixture into the loaf tin and pat down evenly with the back of a fork or wooden spoon. (Clean fingers are okay too!) Bake in the oven for 25 - 30 minutes.  Finished.
